name: Red Knot of Destiny
description:
⟣┈┈┈┈┈┉┉⊏ ♡ ⊐┉┉┈┈┈┈┈⟢ 

Have you met your beloved person in your dreams? Have you shared your subconscious imaginary worlds with them?

That’s the highest level of closeness.

And, of course, it requires quite a strong bond.

Your thoughts, your feelings, your souls must be tightly knotted.

They must be tightly tied by the red thread of fate.

 

Let us tell you the story about a boy and a girl, whose souls have this kind of connection. Let them lead you and lure you into their shared dreams. There is peace and tranquility. There is beauty. There is darkness and puzzles not so easy to solve. After all, there are many hidden mistakes. But it doesn’t matter as long as the boy and the girl are together.

 

⟣┈┈┈┈┈┉┉⊏ ♡ ⊐┉┉┈┈┈┈┈⟢

Controls:

w, a, d/left, up, right - move your character.

Space - tighten/loosen the bond.

 

⟣┈┈┈┈┈┉┉⊏ ♡ ⊐┉┉┈┈┈┈┈⟢

This game was originally made for Knot Jam, but we didn't manage to do it in time.

It's rather a tiny demo at this stage, so we would really like to hear your opinion and feelings about it.
